Name: Needs: Attention :wave:
Description: Reply has been added to issue, maintainer to review

Name: Needs: Author Feedback :ear:
Description: Awaiting feedback from the issue/PR author

Name: Needs: External Changes :hammer_and_pick:
Description: When an issue/PR requires changes that are outside of the control of the module. e.g. to an RP.

Name: Needs: More Evidence :balance_scale:
Description: We are looking for more evidence to make a decision on this

Name: Needs: Triage :mag:
Description: Maintainers need to triage still

Name: Status: Awaiting Release To Be Cut :scissors:
Description: This is fixed in the main branch but not in the latest release, will be fixed with next release cut

Name: Status: Do Not Merge :no_entry:
Description: Do not merge PRs with this label attached as they are not ready or aligned to future direction etc.

Name: Status: External Contribution :earth_africa:
Description: This is being worked on by someone outside of the AVM module owners/contributors or AVM core team

Name: Status: Fixed :white_check_mark:
Description: Auto label applied when issue fixed by merged PR

Name: Status: Help Wanted :sos:
Description: Extra attention is needed

Name: Status: In PR :point_right:
Description: This is when an issue is due to be fixed in an open PR

Name: Status: Invalid :x:
Description: This doesn't seem right

Name: Status: Long Term :hourglass_flowing_sand:
Description: We will do it, but will take a longer amount of time due to complexity/priorities

Name: Status: No Recent Activity :zzz:
Description: When an issue/PR has not been modified for X amount of days

Name: Status: Wont Fix :-1:
Description: This will not be worked on

Name: Type: Bug :bug:
Description: Something isn't working

Name: Type: Documentation :page_facing_up:
Description: Improvements or additions to documentation

Name: Type: Duplicate :palms_up_together:
Description: This issue or pull request already exists

Name: Type: Feature Request :heavy_plus_sign:
Description: New feature or request

Name: Type: Hygiene :broom:
Description: things related to testing, issue triage etc.

Name: Type: New Module Proposal :bulb:
Description: A new module for AVM is being proposed

Name: Type: Question/Feedback :raising_hand:
Description: Further information is requested or just some feedback

Name: Type: Security Bug :lock:
Description: This is a security bug

Name: Status: Module Orphaned :eyes:
Description: The module has no owner and is therefore orphaned at this time

Name: Type: AVM :a: :v: :m:
Description: This is an AVM related issue

Name: Language: Terraform :globe_with_meridians:
Description: This is related to the Terraform IaC language

Name: Language: Bicep :muscle:
Description: This is related to the Bicep IaC language

Name: Status: Migrate from CARML :articulated_lorry:
Description: This item is related to a module migration from CARML

Name: Status: Migrate from TFVM :articulated_lorry:
Description: This item is related to a module migration from TFVM

Name: Status: Owners Identified :metal:
Description: This module has its owners identified
